mapper.sql: idx, title, content, writer, view_cnt, notice_yn, secret_yn, delete_yn, insert_time, update_time, delete_time
mapper.insert: insert into tb_board () values ( #{idx}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, 0, ifnull(#{noticeYn}, 0), ifnull(#{secretYn}, 0), 0, now(), null, null )
mapper.update: update tb_board set update_time = now(), title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, notice_yn = ifnull(#{noticeYn}, 0), secret_yn = ifnull(#{secretYn}, 0) where idx = #{idx}
update tb_board set delete_yn = 1, delete_time = now() where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select * from tb_board where delete_yn = 0 order by notice_yn desc, idx desc, insert_time desc
select count(*) from tb_board where delete_yn = 0
